field.name: ORDER_NUMBER
field.title: Order Number
field.description: Each order should be identified by a unique order identification number

field.name: ORDER_DATE
field.title: Order Date
field.description: The date the order was placed

field.name: MANUFACTURER_NAME
field.title: Manufacturer's name
field.description: The brand of the manufacturer, listed as the manufacturer reports it.

field.name: MANUFACTURER_PART_NUMBER
field.title: Manufacturer's Part Number
field.description: The part number or SKU assigned by the manufacturer, listed as the manufacturer reports it, must match part number format submitted on approved product list.

field.name: CONTRACTOR_PART_NUMBER
field.title: Contractor's Part Number
field.description: The part number or SKU assigned by the supplying Contractor, must match part number format submitted on approved product list

field.name: UPC_A
field.title: UPC_A
field.description: The 12 numerical digits found on a products barcode

field.name: PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION
field.title: Product Description
field.description: Description of product

field.name: PRODUCT_SUBCATEGORY
field.title: MRO Subcategory
field.description: Identifies which subcategory the product falls into based on SIN awarded (Hardware; Tools and Tool Cabinets; Paints, Adhesives and Sealants)

constraints.pattern: Hardware|HARDWARE|Tools and Tool Cabinets|TOOLS AND TOOL CABINETS|Paints|PAINTS|Adhesives and Sealants|ADHESIVES AND SEALANTS

field.name: UNIT_OF_MEASURE
field.title: Unit of Measure
field.description: The physical measurement of quantity in which the item was sold (ex. each, box, carton, gallon) abbreviated in standard two character code.

field.name: QUANTITY
field.title: Quantity
field.description: The number of units purchased

field.name: ITEMS_SOLD
field.title: Items Sold
field.description: Number of Items per Unit of Issue (UOI)

field.name: BPA_PRICE
field.title: Blanket Purchase Agreement Price
field.description: The price charged for a single unit. AKA Price Paid.

field.name: BPA_EXTENDED_PRICE
field.title: Blanket Purchase Agreement Extended Price
field.description: Quantity of items sold multiplied by BPA price.
The price charged for a single unit. AKA Price Paid.

field.name: DEBIT_CREDIT_INDICATOR
field.title: Debit Credit Indicator
field.description: Identifies if the sales value was provided to the supplier (debit) or returned to the customer (credit).
The price charged for a single unit. AKA Price Paid.

field.name: MAS_PRICE
field.title: Multiple Award Schedule Price
field.description: The price charged for a single unit on MAS 51V

field.name: MAS_EXTENDED_PRICE
field.title: Multiple Award Schedule Extended Price
field.description: Quantity of items sold multiplied by BPA price.

field.name: DISCOUNT_AMOUNT
field.title: Discount Amount
field.description: The price charged for a single unit on MAS 51V

field.name: ORDERING_AGENCY_NAME
field.title: Ordering Agency Name
field.description: The purchasing Agency or Department.

field.name: ORDERING_SUB_AGENCY_NAME
field.title: Ordering Sub Agency Name
field.description: The purchasing Sub-Agency or Bureau.

field.name: MARKET_BASKET_FLAG
field.title: Market Basket Flag
field.description: Identifies if the item is a part of the market basket

field.name: ABILITY_ONE_FLAG
field.title: Ability One Flag
field.description: Identifies if the item was produced by an AbilityOne manufacturer

field.name: BERRY_AMENDMENT_FLAG
field.title: Berry Amendment Flag
field.description: Identifies if the item was produced by an Berry Amendment manufacturer.

field.name: CPG_INDICATOR
field.title: Comprehensive Procurement Guideline Identifier
field.description: Identifies if the item is a Comprehensive Procurement Guideline item.

field.name: BIOPREFERRED_INDICATOR
field.title: Bio Preferred Indicator
field.description: Identifies if the item is a Bio-Preferred Product.

field.name: ENERGYSTAR_INDICATOR
field.title: Energy Star Indicator
field.description: Identifies if the item is an EnergyStar Product.

field.name: WATERSENSE_INDICATOR
field.title: WaterSense Indicator
field.description: Identifies if the item is a WaterSense Product.

field.name: SALES_CHANNEL
field.title: Sales Channel
field.description: Phone, Fax, E-mail, GSA Advantage, e-Buy, DoD EMALL, Vendor Portal, Walk-in Store.

field.name: PAYMENT_METHOD
field.title: Payment Method
field.description: Purchase card, purchase order, etc.

field.name: DELIVERY_METHOD
field.title: Delivery Method
field.description: Standard, Next Business Day, Next Day Desktop, etc.

constraints.pattern: Standard|Next Business DayDesktop|Secure Desktop|Next Day Desktop|Next Day Secure Desktop|International

field.name: SHIPPING_WEIGHT
field.title: Shipping Weight
field.description: Weight of shipment in pounds.

field.name: TO_ZIP_CODE
field.title: To Zip Code
field.description: Zip code of the final destination of the order.

field.name: FROM_ZIP_CODE
field.title: From Zip Code
field.description: Zip code of the origin location of the order.

field.name: FREIGHT_CHARGE
field.title: Freight Charge
field.description: Shipping cost of expedited or overnight shipping - FOB Destination.

field.name: SUPPLIMENTAL_FEES
field.title: Supplimental Fees
field.description: Supplemental fees charged (e.g., processing orders below the minimum, etc.)

field.name: FULFILLMENT_DATE
field.title: FulFillment Date
field.description: The date when product in the order was delivered to the recipient.

field.name: CONTRACTOR_NAME
field.title: Contractor Name
field.description: Name of the BPA holder fulfilling the order.

field.name: CONTRACT_NUMBER
field.title: Contract Number
field.description: BPA Contract number the purchase was made under.

field.name: DODAAC
field.title: DoDAAC
field.description: Department of Defense Activity Address Code
